document.full_text: u.s. secretary of state hillary clinton said on friday pakistan needed to take decisive steps against islamist militancy and that relations between the two allies, tense since the killing of osama bin laden, had reached a turning point.
document.title: clinton calls on pakistan to do more against militants
lines_and_colors: u.s. secretary of state hillary clinton said on friday pakistan needed to take decisive steps against islamist militancy and that relations between the two allies, tense since the killing of osama bin laden, had reached a turning point.
